info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

post.description: Creates a new AllTypes and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the AllTypes with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: AllTypes with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the AllTypes with the requested ID.

204.description: AllTypes with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a AllTypes and persists changes to storage.
